title: Val Kilmer Treated at Hospital Reacts to 2nd Health Scare Rumor
text:
Val Kilmer Treated at Hospital, Reacts to 2nd Health Scare Rumor 
E online Friday 23rd October, 2015 
actor was recently the subject of a health scare rumor, his second in almost nine months. It claimed he had been hospitalized in the ICU at a Los Angeles hospital and could barely speak, with tubes hooked up to him."Thank you all for your love and support. There's a rumor I'm unwell again and in hospital which is totally untrue," Kilmer wrote on...
